name: Cognitive Ability Test
description: A general cognitive ability assessment measuring logical, numerical, and verbal reasoning.

name: Situational Judgment Test
description: Assesses judgment and decision-making in work-related scenarios.

name: Numerical Reasoning Test
description: Measures ability to understand and analyze numerical data.

name: Verbal Reasoning Test
description: Assesses ability to evaluate and interpret written information.

name: Personality Questionnaire
description: Provides insight into behavioral styles and preferences at work.
